articles.title: Watch: China's military parade begins with gun salute
articles.description: China's parade in Tiananmen Square began with an 80-gun salute marking 80 years since victory over Japan in World War II.
articles.content:
China's military parade in Tiananmen Square began with an 80-gun salute marking 80 years since victory over Japan in World War II.

President Xi Jinping was joined by 26 world leaders, including Vladimir Putin and Kim Jong Un.
articles.author: Zyvra Desk
